text: Jonkheer Mr. Maximilien Vegelin van Claerbergen (17 August 1927 – 11 April 2011) was a Dutch diplomat and founder of Biblionef International. He was born on 17 August 1927 in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin and died on 11 April 2011 in Zeist. ==Sources== *Nederland's Adelsboek; 96 (2011), pp. 74–75. Category:1927 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Dutch diplomats
title: Maximilien Vegelin van Claerbergen
